thread.title: Police: 3 men stabbed during robbery in Boston grocery store - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Police: 3 men stabbed during robbery in Boston grocery store - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Police: 3 men stabbed during robbery in Boston grocery store - Massachusetts news
text:
BOSTON (AP) — Police are investigating after three men were stabbed during a robbery in a small Boston grocery store.
Police say the stabbing happened at Familia Grocery Wednesday night. The store’s owner, a co-worker and a customer were all hospitalized with serious injuries. Their wounds are not considered life-threatening.
 A witness tells WHDH-TV she saw the owner arguing with a man who walked into the store with a dog. The witness says she then saw the owner walk out of the store with a stab wound on his arm.
Police say the incident began as an argument and escalated into a robbery and stabbing.
Police are investigating.
